aya: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَٰهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَٰطِينِ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
translation: We have adorned the lowest heaven with lamps and have made them as missiles to stone the devils, and We have prepared for them the punishment of the Blazing Fire.

aya: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
translation: For those who disbelieve in their Lord there will be the punishment of Hell. What a terrible destination!

aya: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ
translation: When they are thrown in it, they will hear its roaring as it boils up,

aya: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ
translation: almost bursting in fury. Every time a group is thrown in it, its keepers will ask them, “Did there not come to you a warner?”

aya: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَٰلٍ كَبِيرٍ
translation: They will say, “Yes, a warner did come to us, but we denied and said, ‘Allah has not sent down anything; you are greatly misguided.’”

aya: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
translation: And they will say, “If only we had listened or understood, we would not be among the dwellers of the Blazing Fire.”

aya: فَٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِّأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
translation: Thus they will confess their sins. So away with the dwellers of the Blazing Fire!

aya: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
translation: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and a great reward.

aya: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
translation: Whether you speak secretly or openly, He is All-Knowing of that which is in the hearts.

aya: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
translation: Does He not know His Own creation, when He is the Most Subtle, the All-Aware?

aya: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
translation: It is He Who made the earth smooth for you, so travel through its regions and eat from His provisions. And to Him is the resurrection.

aya: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ
translation: Do you feel secure that He Who is in the heaven will not cause the earth to sink with you, then suddenly convulse?

aya: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
translation: Do you feel secure that He Who is in the heaven will not send against you a storm of stones? Only then would you know how [serious] My warning was!

aya: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
translation: Those who came before them rejected [the messengers]; then how severe was My response!

aya: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَٰٓفَّٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ
translation: Do they not see the birds above them, spreading out and folding in their wings? None holds them up except the Most Compassionate. He is indeed All-Seeing of everything.

aya: أَمَّنْ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ إِنِ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ
translation: Which is your army that can come to your aid against the Most Compassionate? The disbelievers are in utter delusion.

aya: أَمَّنْ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
translation: Who is there to give you provision if He withholds His provision? Yet they persist in arrogance and aversion.

aya: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
translation: Who is better guided: the one who walks stumbling and falling on his face or the one who walks upright on a straight path?

aya: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
translation: Say, “It is He Who brought you into being and gave you hearing, sight, and hearts; little do you give thanks.”

aya: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
translation: Say, “It is He Who has dispersed you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.”

aya: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
translation: They say: “When will this promise come to pass, if you are truthful?”

aya: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
translation: Say, “That knowledge is with Allah alone, and I am only a clear warner.”

aya: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
translation: Then when they see it approaching closer, the faces of the disbelievers will be distressed, and it will be said, “This is what you were asking for.”

aya: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
translation: Say, “What do you think, if Allah causes me and those who are with me to die or shows us mercy, who will save the disbelievers from a painful punishment?”

aya: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
translation: Say, “He is the Most Compassionate; we believe in Him and put our trust in Him. You will come to know who is clearly misguided.”

aya: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينٍۭ
translation: Say, “What do you think, if your water were to sink deep into the earth, who can bring you flowing water?”

aya: نٓ وَٱلْقَلَمِ وَمَا يَسْطُرُونَ
translation: Nūn. By the pen and what they write,

aya: مَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجْنُونٍ
translation: By the grace of your Lord [O Prophet], you are not madman.

aya: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجْرًا غَيْرَ مَمْنُونٍ
translation: You will surely have a never-ending reward.

aya: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٍ
translation: Indeed, you are of a great moral character.

aya: فَسَتُبْصِرُ وَيُبْصِرُونَ
translation: Soon you will see and they will see,

aya: بِأَييِّكُمُ ٱلْمَفْتُونُ
translation: which of you is afflicted with madness.

aya: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
translation: Indeed, your Lord alone knows best who has strayed from His way and those who are rightly guided.

aya: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: So do not obey the deniers.

aya: وَدُّوا۟ لَوْ تُدْهِنُ فَيُدْهِنُونَ
translation: They wish that you would compromise so they would too compromise.

aya: وَلَا تُطِعْ كُلَّ حَلَّافٍ مَّهِينٍ
translation: And do not obey every disgraceful swearer,

aya: هَمَّازٍ مَّشَّآءٍۭ بِنَمِيمٍ
translation: backbiter, gossip-monger,

aya: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
translation: withholder of good, transgressor, sinful,

aya: عُتُلٍّۭ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ زَنِيمٍ
translation: coarse, and furthermore, an illegitimate child.

aya: أَن كَانَ ذَا مَالٍ وَبَنِينَ
translation: Simply because he has wealth and children,

aya: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, “Ancient fables!”

aya: سَنَسِمُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلْخُرْطُومِ
translation: We will soon brand him on the snout.

aya: إِنَّا بَلَوْنَٰهُمْ كَمَا بَلَوْنَآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ إِذْ أَقْسَمُوا۟ لَيَصْرِمُنَّهَا مُصْبِحِينَ
translation: Indeed, We have tested them [the Makkans] as We tested the people of the garden, when they swore to harvest its fruits in the early morning,

aya: وَلَا يَسْتَثْنُونَ
translation: and made no exception [by saying: if Allah wills].

aya: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَآئِفٌ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَآئِمُونَ
translation: Then it was struck by an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep,

aya: فَأَصْبَحَتْ كَٱلصَّرِيمِ
translation: and it turned to ashes as black as night.

aya: فَتَنَادَوْا۟ مُصْبِحِينَ
translation: Then in the early morning they called out to one another:

aya: أَنِ ٱغْدُوا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْثِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰرِمِينَ
translation: “Go early to your garden if you really wish to harvest.”

aya: فَٱنطَلَقُوا۟ وَهُمْ يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ
translation: So they set out, whispering to one another,

aya: أَن لَّا يَدْخُلَنَّهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكُم مِّسْكِينٌ
translation: “Not a single poor person should enter your garden today.”

aya: وَغَدَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْدٍ قَٰدِرِينَ
translation: And they left early, fully determined to stick to their plan.

aya: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهَا قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا لَضَآلُّونَ
translation: But when they saw the garden, they said, “We must have lost our way!

aya: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
translation: Rather, we have been deprived.”

aya: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
translation: The best among them said, “Did I not say to you to glorify Allah?”

aya: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
translation: They said, “Glory be to our Lord! We were truly wrongdoers.”

aya: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَلَٰوَمُونَ
translation: Then they turned to one another, throwing blame.

aya: قَالُوا۟ يَٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا طَٰغِينَ
translation: They said, “Woe to us! We were surely transgressors.

aya: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبْدِلَنَا خَيْرًا مِّنْهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ
translation: Our Lord may give us something better than this. We certainly turn to our Lord in hope.”

aya: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْعَذَابُ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: Such is the punishment [in this world]; but the punishment of the Hereafter is far worse, if only they knew.

aya: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
translation: Indeed, the righteous will have gardens of bliss with their Lord.

aya: أَفَنَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ كَٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
translation: Should We then treat Muslims like the wicked?

aya: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
translation: What is the matter with you that you make such a judgment?

aya: أَمْ لَكُمْ كِتَٰبٌ فِيهِ تَدْرُسُونَ
translation: Or do you have a scripture in which you read

aya: إِنَّ لَكُمْ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ
translation: that you will be given whatever you choose?

aya: أَمْ لَكُمْ أَيْمَٰنٌ عَلَيْنَا بَٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ إِنَّ لَكُمْ لَمَا تَحْكُمُونَ
translation: Or do you have a solemn promise binding upon Us until the Day of Resurrection, that you will have whatever you decide for yourselves?

aya: سَلْهُمْ أَيُّهُم بِذَٰلِكَ زَعِيمٌ
translation: Ask them which of them can guarantee that.

aya: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَآءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَٰدِقِينَ
translation: Or do they have associate-gods? Then let them bring forth their associate-gods, if they are truthful.

aya: يَوْمَ يُكْشَفُ عَن سَاقٍ وَيُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
translation: On the Day when the Shin [of Allah] will be uncovered, and they are invited to prostrate, but they will not be able to do so.

aya: خَٰشِعَةً أَبْصَٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ وَقَدْ كَانُوا۟ يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَٰلِمُونَ
translation: Their eyes will be downcast, overwhelmed with humiliation, for they were invited to prostrate when they were capable [but they refused].

aya: فَذَرْنِى وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: So leave to Me those who reject this message [O Prophet]. We will gradually lead them to their ruin in ways that they do not perceive.

aya: وَأُمْلِى لَهُمْ إِنَّ كَيْدِى مَتِينٌ
translation: I will give them respite, but My plan is firm.

aya: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
translation: Or are you asking them for a reward, so they find it too burdensome?

aya: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
translation: Or do they have knowledge of the unseen, so they write it down?

aya: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌ
translation: So be patient with the decree of your Lord, and do not be like [Jonah], the man of the Whale, when he cried out in anguish.

aya: لَّوْلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعْمَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ
translation: Had it not been for the grace that he received from his Lord, he would have surely been thrown at the barren shore, blameworthy.

aya: فَٱجْتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَجَعَلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
translation: But his Lord chose him, and made him one of the righteous.

aya: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَٰرِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجْنُونٌ
translation: The disbelievers would almost strike you down with their malicious gazes when they hear the Reminder, and they say, “He is certainly mad.”

aya: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: But it is nothing other than a reminder to the whole world.

aya: ٱلْحَآقَّةُ
translation: The Inevitable Hour!

aya: مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ
translation: What is the Inevitable Hour?

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ
translation: How do you know what the Inevitable Hour is?

aya: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ وَعَادٌۢ بِٱلْقَارِعَةِ
translation: Thamūd and ‘Ād denied the striking calamity of the Hour.

aya: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ
translation: As for Thamūd, they were destroyed by a dreadful blast.

aya: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
translation: And as for ‘Ād, they were destroyed by a furious windstorm

aya: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
translation: which He unleashed against them for seven successive nights and eight days, so you would see the people lying dead as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.

aya: فَهَلْ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّنۢ بَاقِيَةٍ
translation: Do you see any trace of them now?

aya: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ
translation: Also Pharaoh and those who came before him, and the overturned cities [of Lot] committed grave sin,

aya: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً
translation: each disobeying the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a severe punishment.

aya: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ
translation: Indeed, when the floodwater overflowed, We carried you [O humans] in the sailing Ark,

aya: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌ وَٰعِيَةٌ
translation: so that We might make it a reminder for you, and that attentive ears may take heed.

aya: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
translation: Then when the Trumpet is blown with a single blast,

aya: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً
translation: and the earth and mountains are lifted up and crushed with a single blow,

aya: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ
translation: on that Day the Inevitable Event will occur.

aya: وَٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَهِىَ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاهِيَةٌ
translation: And the sky will split asunder and will be frail on that day,

aya: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَٰنِيَةٌ
translation: with the angels on all its sides, and on that Day, eight [mighty angels] will bear the Throne of your Lord above them.

aya: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
translation: On that day, you will be brought forth [before Allah], and none of your secrets will remain hidden.

aya: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَٰبِيَهْ
translation: As for the one who is given his Record in his right hand, he will say, “Here is my Record, read it!

aya: إِنِّى ظَنَنتُ أَنِّى مُلَٰقٍ حِسَابِيَهْ
translation: I was sure that I would meet my reckoning.”

aya: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
translation: So he will be in a pleasant life,

aya: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
translation: in a lofty garden,

aya: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌ
translation: with clustered fruit within his reach.

aya: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ
translation: [They will be told,] “Eat and drink joyfully for what you did in the days gone by.”

aya: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَٰبِيَهْ
translation: As for the one who is given his Record in his left hand, he will say, “Would that I had not been given my Record,

aya: وَلَمْ أَدْرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ
translation: nor had I known anything of my reckoning!

aya: يَٰلَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ ٱلْقَاضِيَةَ
translation: Would that it [death] had been the end of me!

aya: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنِّى مَالِيَهْ
translation: My wealth has been of no avail to me.

aya: هَلَكَ عَنِّى سُلْطَٰنِيَهْ
translation: My authority has vanished.”

aya: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
translation: [It will be said,] “Seize him and shackle him,

aya: ثُمَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ
translation: then make him burn in the Blazing Fire,

aya: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ
translation: then tie him up with chain of seventy cubits long.

aya: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
translation: For he did not believe in Allah, the Most Great,

aya: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
translation: nor did he encourage feeding the needy.

aya: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ ٱلْيَوْمَ هَٰهُنَا حَمِيمٌ
translation: So Today he will have no close friend here,

aya: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْلِينٍ
translation: nor any food except the discharge of wounds,

aya: لَّا يَأْكُلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْخَٰطِـُٔونَ
translation: none will eat it except the sinners.”

aya: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِمَا تُبْصِرُونَ
translation: I swear by what you can see.

aya: وَمَا لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
translation: and what you cannot see!

aya: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
translation: Indeed, this is the word of a noble Messenger,

aya: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: and it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe!

aya: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
translation: Nor is it the word of a soothsayer; little do you take heed!

aya: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: It is a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

aya: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ ٱلْأَقَاوِيلِ
translation: If he had falsely attributed something to Us,

aya: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِٱلْيَمِينِ
translation: We would have surely seized him by the right hand,

aya: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ ٱلْوَتِينَ
translation: then severed his aorta,

aya: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَٰجِزِينَ
translation: and none of you could have rescued him.

aya: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذْكِرَةٌ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
translation: This [Qur’an] is indeed a reminder for those who are righteous.

aya: وَإِنَّا لَنَعْلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِينَ
translation: And We surely know that some of you will be deniers,

aya: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
translation: and it will certainly be a source of regret for the disbelievers.

aya: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَقُّ ٱلْيَقِينِ
translation: And this is indeed the absolute truth.

aya: فَسَبِّحْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
translation: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

aya: سَأَلَ سَآئِلٌۢ بِعَذَابٍ وَاقِعٍ
translation: A challenger asked for a punishment bound to come

aya: لِّلْكَٰفِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُۥ دَافِعٌ
translation: upon the disbelievers, which none can avert,

aya: مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذِى ٱلْمَعَارِجِ
translation: from Allah, Lord of the pathways of ascent,

aya: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
translation: by which the angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him on a Day the length of which is fifty thousand years.

aya: فَٱصْبِرْ صَبْرًا جَمِيلًا
translation: So be patient [O Prophet] with beautiful patience.

aya: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُۥ بَعِيدًا
translation: Indeed, they see this [punishment] far off,

aya: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِيبًا
translation: but We see it to be close at hand.

aya: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ كَٱلْمُهْلِ
translation: On the Day when the sky will be like molten brass

aya: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ
translation: and the mountains will be like dyed wool,

aya: وَلَا يَسْـَٔلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًا
translation: and no close friend will ask about another,

aya: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ
translation: even though they will see one another. The wicked will wish he could ransom himself from the punishment of that Day by offering his children,

aya: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَأَخِيهِ
translation: and his wife and his brother,

aya: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ ٱلَّتِى تُـْٔوِيهِ
translation: and his kindred who stood by him,

aya: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
translation: and everyone on earth, just to save himself.

aya: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
translation: By no means! It is a raging Flame,

aya: نَزَّاعَةً لِّلشَّوَىٰ
translation: that will strip off the scalps.

aya: تَدْعُوا۟ مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
translation: It will call everyone who turned their backs and disobeyed,

aya: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰٓ
translation: and amassed and hoarded wealth.

aya: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
translation: Indeed, man was created impatient:

aya: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعًا
translation: when evil befalls him, he bewails,

aya: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا
translation: but when good fortune comes his way, he becomes tight-fisted –

aya: إِلَّا ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
translation: except those who pray,

aya: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ دَآئِمُونَ
translation: who are steadfast in their prayers;

aya: وَٱلَّذِينَ فِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ مَّعْلُومٌ
translation: and who give a due share of their wealth

aya: لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
translation: to the beggar and the dispossessed;

aya: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: and who firmly believe in the Day of Judgment;

aya: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
translation: and those who fear the punishment of their Lord –

aya: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍ
translation: for none can feel secure from their Lord’s punishment –

aya: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَٰفِظُونَ
translation: and those who guard their private parts,

aya: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
translation: except from their wives or bondwomen whom they own, for then they are not to be blamed.

aya: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
translation: But whoever seeks beyond that, it is they who are the transgressors.

aya: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَٰنَٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
translation: and those who fulfill their trusts and pledges;

aya: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَٰدَٰتِهِمْ قَآئِمُونَ
translation: and who are upright in their testimonies;

aya: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
translation: and who take due care of their prayers;

aya: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍ مُّكْرَمُونَ
translation: they will be honored in gardens.

aya: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ
translation: What is the matter with the disbelievers that they are rushing towards you [O Prophet],

aya: عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
translation: from the right and from the left, in crowds?

aya: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
translation: Does everyone of them aspire to enter a garden of bliss?

aya: كَلَّآ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُم مِّمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
translation: By no means! We have created them from what they know.

aya: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ
translation: I swear by the Lord of the sunrises and sunsets that We are surely Capable

aya: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
translation: to replace them with others better than them, and none can escape Our decree.

aya: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
translation: So leave them to engage in their falsehood and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised;

aya: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
translation: the Day when they will rush out of their graves as if they are racing towards a goal,

aya: خَٰشِعَةً أَبْصَٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
translation: with their eyes downcast and overwhelmed with disgrace. That is the Day that they were promised.

aya: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
translation: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, “Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment.”

aya: قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
translation: He said: “O my people, indeed I am a clear warner to you,

aya: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
translation: that you worship Allah and fear Him, and obey me;

aya: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
translation: He will forgive you some of your sins and grant you respite until an appointed term. Indeed, when Allah’s appointed term comes, it cannot be delayed, if you only knew!”

aya: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
translation: He said, “My Lord, I have surely called my people night and day,

aya: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا
translation: but my call only drove them further away.

aya: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا
translation: Every time I call them so that You may forgive them, they thrust their fingers into their ears and cover their faces with their garments, and persist in obstinacy and grow extremely arrogant.

aya: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
translation: Then I called them openly,

aya: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
translation: then I addressed them in public and in private,

aya: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
translation: I said, ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord. Indeed, He is Most Forgiving.

aya: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
translation: He will shower you with abundant rain from the sky,

aya: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَٰرًا
translation: and He will give you wealth and children, and bestow upon you gardens and rivers.

aya: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
translation: What is the matter with you that you do not fear the Majesty of Allah,

aya: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
translation: when He has created you in stages?

aya: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا
translation: Do you not see how Allah has created seven heavens, one above another,

aya: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
translation: and has placed the moon therein as a light and the sun as a burning lamp?

aya: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
translation: Allah has produced you from the earth like a plant,

aya: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
translation: then He will return you into it, and then will bring you out again.

aya: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
translation: Allah has made the earth wide spread for you

aya: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
translation: so that you may tread its spacious paths.’”

aya: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
translation: Noah said, “My Lord, they have disobeyed me and followed those whose wealth and children did not increase them except in loss.

aya: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
translation: They have contrived a mighty plot,

aya: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
translation: They said, ‘Do not abandon your gods; and do not abandon Wadd, Suwā‘, Yaghūth, Ya‘ūq, and Nasr.’

aya: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلًا
translation: They have led many astray. So [O Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error.”

aya: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
translation: Because of their sins they were drowned and then were cast into the Fire, and they did not find any helpers against Allah.

aya: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
translation: Noah said, “My Lord, do not leave on earth a single disbeliever.

aya: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
translation: For if You leave them, they will surely lead Your slaves astray and beget none but wicked disbelievers.

aya: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents, and whoever enters my house as a believer, and all the believing men and women, and do not increase the wrongdoers except in ruin.”

aya: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
translation: Say, “It has been revealed to me that a group of jinn listened [to the Qur’an,] and they said, ‘Indeed, we have heard a wondrous recitation

aya: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا
translation: that guides to the right way, so we have believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Lord.

aya: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
translation: And that He – our exalted and glorified Lord – has neither taken a wife nor a child;

aya: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا
translation: and that the fool among us [Satan] used to say outrageous things about Allah,

aya: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
translation: although we thought that humans and jinn would never tell lies about Allah.

aya: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
translation: And there were some men who used to seek refuge with some jinn, but they only increased them in burden.

aya: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا
translation: They thought, just like you [jinn] thought that Allah would never send any messenger.

aya: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
translation: We have sought to reach the heaven but found it filled with stern guards and flaming fire.

aya: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْءَانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
translation: We used to take up positions there for eavesdropping, but now anyone who eavesdrops will find a flaming fire waiting for him.

aya: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
translation: We do not know whether evil is intended for those on earth, or their Lord intends good for them.

aya: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا
translation: Among us are some who are righteous and some who are otherwise, for we follow divergent ways.

aya: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا
translation: We have realized that we can never escape Allah on earth, nor can we ever escape Him by fleeing.

aya: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
translation: When we heard the guidance [of the Qur’an], we believed in it. Whoever believes in his Lord will have no fear of curtailment [from his reward] or injustice.

aya: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَٰسِطُونَ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا
translation: Among us are some who are Muslims and some who are deviant. Those who accepted Islam have sought the true guidance,

aya: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
translation: but those who are deviant, they will be fuel for Hell.’”

aya: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا
translation: “If they had remained steadfast on the right way, We would have given them abundant rain,

aya: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
translation: as a test for them. But whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord, He will make him suffer an arduous punishment.

aya: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا
translation: The mosques are for Allah alone, so do not supplicate anyone along with Allah.

aya: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
translation: Yet when the slave of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they swarmed around him.”

aya: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
translation: Say [O Prophet], “I only supplicate my Lord and I do not associate anyone with Him.”

aya: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
translation: Say, “I have no power to harm or benefit you.”

aya: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
translation: Say, “None can ever protect me from Allah [if I should disobey Him], nor can I ever find a refuge other than Him.

aya: إِلَّا بَلَٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَٰلَٰتِهِۦ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
translation: I only convey what I receive from Allah and His messages.” And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger will certainly be in the Fire of Hell, abiding therein forever.

aya: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
translation: Until when they see what they were promised, they will realize who is weaker in helpers and fewer in number.

aya: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
translation: Say, “I do not know if what you are promised is near or my Lord has appointed a distant time for it.

aya: عَٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
translation: [He is] Knower of the unseen, He does not reveal His unseen to anyone,

aya: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا
translation: except the messenger whom He chooses, then He appoints angel-guards before him and behind him

aya: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
translation: to ensure that the messengers fully conveyed the messages of their Lord. He encompasses in His knowledge all about them, and keeps count of all things.”

aya: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ
translation: O you the enwrapped one,

aya: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
translation: Stand up in prayer at night except a little,

aya: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
translation: half of it, or a little less,

aya: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا
translation: or a little more, and recite the Qur’an at a measured pace.

aya: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
translation: We will send down upon you a heavy revelation.

aya: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
translation: Indeed, prayer at night is more effective and more conducive to proper recitation.

aya: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
translation: In daytime, you have plenty of time for your worldly matters.

aya: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
translation: And remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself completely to Him.

aya: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
translation: [He is] Lord of the east and the west; none has the right to be worshiped except Him, so take Him as Disposer of your affairs.

aya: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
translation: Bear patiently what they say, and avoid them in a gracious manner.

aya: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
translation: Leave to Me the deniers who are having a life of luxury, and bear with them for a little while.

aya: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
translation: Indeed, We have heavy shackles and a Blazing Fire,

aya: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
translation: and food that chokes, and a painful punishment,

aya: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
translation: on the Day when the earth and the mountains will convulse, and the mountains will be like dunes of loose sand.

aya: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
translation: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger to be a witness over you, just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

aya: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَٰهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
translation: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a severe punishment.

aya: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا
translation: If you disbelieve, then how will you protect yourselves against a Day that will turn children’s hair gray?

aya: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا
translation: It will cause the sky to break asunder. His promise will certainly be fulfilled.

aya: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
translation: Indeed, this is a reminder; so whoever wills may take a way to his Lord.

aya: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌۢ
translation: Indeed, your Lord knows that you [O Prophet] stand up in prayer for nearly two-thirds of the night, or half of it, or one-third of it, as do others among your companions. Allah determines the night and the day; He knows that you [Muslims] cannot keep an accurate count of it, so He pardoned you. Recite then as much of the Qur’an as is easy for you [in the night prayers]. He knows that there are some among you who will be ill, and others traveling in the land, seeking the grace of Allah, and others fighting in Allah’s way. So recite as much of it as is easy for you; establish prayer and give zakah; and lend to Allah a goodly loan. Whatever good you send forth for yourselves, you will find it with Allah, much better in condition and much greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah, for indeed Allah is All-Forgiving, Most-Merciful.

aya: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ
translation: O you covered [in your cloak],

aya: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
translation: arise and warn,

aya: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
translation: and proclaim the greatness of your Lord,

aya: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
translation: and purify your garments,

aya: وَٱلرُّجْزَ فَٱهْجُرْ
translation: and shun idol worshiping,

aya: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
translation: and do not do a favor for a greater return,

aya: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصْبِرْ
translation: and be patient for the sake of your Lord.

aya: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِى ٱلنَّاقُورِ
translation: When the Trumpet is sounded,

aya: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
translation: that Day will be a difficult day,

aya: عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
translation: not easy for the disbelievers.

aya: ذَرْنِى وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
translation: Leave me alone to deal with the one whom I created,

aya: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُۥ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا
translation: and gave him abundant wealth,

aya: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
translation: and sons by his side,

aya: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمْهِيدًا
translation: and gave him a life of comfort and power,

aya: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
translation: yet he aspires that I should give him more.

aya: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِءَايَٰتِنَا عَنِيدًا
translation: By no means! For he has been stubborn against Our verses.

aya: سَأُرْهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
translation: I will subject him to an unbearable punishment.

aya: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
translation: For he reflected and plotted [against the Qur’an].

aya: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
translation: May he perish, how he plotted!

aya: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
translation: Again, may he perish, how he plotted!

aya: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
translation: Then he looked around,

aya: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
translation: then he frowned and scowled,

aya: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ
translation: then turned away with arrogance,

aya: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
translation: then said, “This is nothing but magic from the past.

aya: إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوْلُ ٱلْبَشَرِ
translation: This is nothing but the words of a man.”

aya: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
translation: Soon I will make him burn in the Scorching Fire.

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
translation: How do you know what Scorching Fire is?

aya: لَا تُبْقِى وَلَا تَذَرُ
translation: It leaves nothing and spares no one,

aya: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
translation: scorching the skin.

aya: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
translation: It is overseen by nineteen [angels].

aya: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَٰٓئِكَةً وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَٰنًا وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًا كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
translation: We have only appointed angels as keepers of the Fire, and We have only made their number as a test for the disbelievers, so that those who were given the Scripture may have certainty and the believers may increase in faith; and neither those who were given the Scripture nor the believers may have any doubts; and so that those [hypocrites] in whose hearts is sickness and the disbelievers may say, “What does Allah mean by this number?” Thus Allah causes to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills, and none knows the soldiers of your Lord but He. This is but a reminder to mankind.

aya: كَلَّا وَٱلْقَمَرِ
translation: No indeed! By the moon,

aya: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
translation: and by the night when it departs,

aya: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَآ أَسْفَرَ
translation: and by the dawn when it brightens,

aya: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ
translation: Hellfire is indeed one of the greatest matters,

aya: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
translation: a warning to mankind,

aya: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
translation: to whoever among you chooses to advance or regress.

aya: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
translation: Every soul is held in pledge for its deeds,

aya: إِلَّآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْيَمِينِ
translation: except the People of the Right,

aya: فِى جَنَّٰتٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
translation: who will be in gardens, asking one another

aya: عَنِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
translation: about the wicked:

aya: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِى سَقَرَ
translation: “What brought you to Hell?”

aya: قَالُوا۟ لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
translation: They will say, “We were not among those who prayed,

aya: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ ٱلْمِسْكِينَ
translation: nor did we feed the poor,

aya: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلْخَآئِضِينَ
translation: and we indulged in falsehood along with those who indulged in it,

aya: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: and we denied the Day of Judgment,

aya: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلْيَقِينُ
translation: until the certainty [of death] came to us.”

aya: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّٰفِعِينَ
translation: So the intercession of intercessors will not benefit them.

aya: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلتَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
translation: Then what is the matter with them that they turn away from the Reminder,

aya: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
translation: as if they were terrified wild asses,

aya: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍۭ
translation: fleeing from a lion?

aya: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
translation: In fact, each one of them desires that open [divine] letters be sent to each of them.

aya: كَلَّا بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ
translation: By no means! They rather do not fear the Hereafter.

aya: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذْكِرَةٌ
translation: No indeed! This [Qur’an] is a reminder.

aya: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
translation: So whoever wills may take heed.

aya: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ
translation: But they will not take heed unless Allah so wills. He is most worthy to be feared and most worthy to forgive.

aya: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ
translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection,

aya: وَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلنَّفْسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
translation: and I swear by the self-reproaching soul!

aya: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
translation: Does man think that We cannot reassemble his bones?

aya: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ
translation: In fact, We are able to restore even his very fingertips.

aya: بَلْ يُرِيدُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
translation: But man desires to persists in his evil ways,

aya: يَسْـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ
translation: and asks [mockingly], “When is the Day of Resurrection?”

aya: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلْبَصَرُ
translation: But when eyes are dazzled,

aya: وَخَسَفَ ٱلْقَمَرُ
translation: and the moon is darkened,

aya: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ
translation: and the sun and the moon are brought together,

aya: يَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ ٱلْمَفَرُّ
translation: on that Day man will say, “Where is the escape?”

aya: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
translation: No indeed! There will be no refuge.

aya: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمُسْتَقَرُّ
translation: On that Day all will end up before your Lord.

aya: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
translation: On that Day man will be informed of what he has sent forth and left behind.

aya: بَلِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٌ
translation: In fact, man will be a witness against himself,

aya: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ
translation: despite the excuses he may put forward.

aya: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
translation: Do not move your tongue [O Prophet] in haste trying to memorize it.

aya: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُۥ وَقُرْءَانَهُۥ
translation: It is upon Us to make you memorize and recite it.

aya: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْءَانَهُۥ
translation: Then when We recite it [through Gabriel], follow its recitation attentively;

aya: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُۥ
translation: then it is upon Us to explain its meanings.

aya: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ
translation: No indeed! You [people] love this fleeting world,

aya: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ
translation: and neglect the Hereafter.

aya: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
translation: On that Day some faces will be bright,

aya: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
translation: looking at their Lord.

aya: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَاسِرَةٌ
translation: And on that Day, some faces will be gloomy,

aya: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
translation: knowing that a crushing calamity will befall them.

aya: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِىَ
translation: Indeed, when the soul reaches the throat,

aya: وَقِيلَ مَنْ رَاقٍ
translation: and it is said, “Is there any healer?”

aya: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلْفِرَاقُ
translation: And he realizes that it is time to depart,

aya: وَٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
translation: when legs are brought together [in a shroud];

aya: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمَسَاقُ
translation: on that Day, he will be driven to your Lord.

aya: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
translation: He neither believed nor prayed;

aya: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
translation: rather he denied and turned away,

aya: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ
translation: then went swaggering to his people,

aya: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
translation: Woe to you [O man], and woe!

aya: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰٓ
translation: Again, woe to you, and woe!

aya: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
translation: Does man think that he will be left neglected?

aya: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِىٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
translation: Was he not once a drop of semen emitted,

aya: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
translation: then he became a clinging clot, then He created him and perfected his form,

aya: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
translation: and made from him both genders, male and female?

aya: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْۦِىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ
translation: Is not He able to bring the dead back to life?

aya: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
translation: Was there not a period of time when man was not a thing [even] mentioned?

aya: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
translation: Indeed, We created man from a drop of mixed fluids, in order to test him. So We gave him hearing and sight.

aya: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
translation: Indeed, We showed him the way, whether he is grateful or ungrateful.

aya: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
translation: We have surely prepared for the disbelievers chains, shackles, and a Blazing Fire.

aya: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
translation: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] flavored with camphor,

aya: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
translation: a spring from which Allah’s slaves will drink, which will flow as they wish.

aya: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
translation: They fulfill their vows and fear a Day whose evil will spread far and wide,

aya: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
translation: and they give food, despite their love for it, to the needy, the orphans, and the captives,

aya: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
translation: [saying to themselves] “We feed you only for the sake of Allah; we seek from you neither reward nor gratitude.

aya: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
translation: We fear from our Lord a grim and distressful Day.”

aya: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
translation: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day, and will grant them radiance and delight,

aya: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
translation: and will reward them for their perseverance with Paradise and garments of silk.

aya: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
translation: They will recline therein on adorned couches; neither feeling scorching heat nor freezing cold.

aya: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
translation: with shady branches spread above them, and clusters of fruit will be made within their reach.

aya: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
translation: They will be served frequently with silver vessels and crystal cups,

aya: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
translation: crystalline goblets of silver, filled precisely as desired.

aya: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
translation: They will be given a glass [of wine] flavored with ginger

aya: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
translation: from a spring therein called Salsabīl.

aya: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
translation: They will be served by eternal young boys; if you see them, you would think that they are scattered pearls.

aya: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
translation: If you were to look around, you would see bliss and a vast dominion.

aya: عَٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
translation: They will be dressed in garments of fine green silk and rich brocade, and will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a pure drink.

aya: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
translation: [And they will be told,] “Indeed, this is your reward, and your efforts have been appreciated.”

aya: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
translation: Indeed, it is We Who have sent down the Qur’an to you in stages.

aya: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
translation: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not obey any sinner or disbeliever from among them.

aya: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
translation: And remember the Name of your Lord morning and evening,

aya: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
translation: and prostrate to Him at night, and glorify Him at length by night.

aya: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
translation: Indeed, these [pagans] love this fleeting life and pay no heed to a heavy Day ahead of them.

aya: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
translation: It is We Who created them and strengthened their build. If We will, We can replace them with others like them.

aya: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
translation: Indeed, this is a reminder; so let anyone who wills may take a way to his Lord.

aya: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
translation: But you cannot will unless Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

aya: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ وَٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
translation: He admits whom He wills into His mercy, but for the wrongdoers He has prepared a painful punishment.

aya: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَٰتِ عُرْفًا
translation: By those [winds] sent forth in succession,

aya: فَٱلْعَٰصِفَٰتِ عَصْفًا
translation: those that blow violently,

aya: وَٱلنَّٰشِرَٰتِ نَشْرًا
translation: and scatter [rainclouds] far and wide,

aya: فَٱلْفَٰرِقَٰتِ فَرْقًا
translation: And by those [angels] who bring criterion;

aya: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَٰتِ ذِكْرًا
translation: and those who deliver revelation,

aya: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
translation: leaving no excuse or giving warning –

aya: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
translation: what you are promised will surely come to pass.

aya: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
translation: So when the stars are extinguished,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتْ
translation: and when the sky is split apart,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
translation: and when the mountains are blown away,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
translation: and when the messengers are summoned,

aya: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
translation: until which Day has all this been postponed?

aya: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ
translation: Until the Day of Judgment.

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ
translation: How do you know what the Day of Judgment is?

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: Did We not destroy the earlier nations?

aya: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
translation: Then We will do likewise to the later ones.

aya: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
translation: This is how We deal with the wicked.

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ
translation: Did We not create you from a worthless fluid,

aya: فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
translation: then We placed it in a secure repository

aya: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
translation: for a determined period?

aya: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَٰدِرُونَ
translation: For We determined it; How excellently We determine!

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
translation: Have We not made the earth a receptacle

aya: أَحْيَآءً وَأَمْوَٰتًا
translation: for the living and the dead,

aya: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَٰمِخَٰتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَٰكُم مَّآءً فُرَاتًا
translation: and placed therein firm towering mountains, and given you fresh water to drink?

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
translation: [They will be told,] “Proceed to that [Fire] which you used to deny!

aya: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِى ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٍ
translation: Proceed to the shadow [of smoke] ascending in three columns,

aya: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
translation: that provides neither shade nor protection from the flames.

aya: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍ كَٱلْقَصْرِ
translation: Indeed, it [Hell] throws up sparks as big as castles,

aya: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَٰلَتٌ صُفْرٌ
translation: as if they were tawny camels.

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
translation: On that Day they won’t speak,

aya: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
translation: nor will they be allowed to make excuses.

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ جَمَعْنَٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: [They will be told,] “This is the Day of Judgment: We have gathered you along with the earlier generations.

aya: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
translation: So if you have any scheme, then plot it against Me.”

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَٰلٍ وَعُيُونٍ
translation: Indeed, the righteous will be amid shades and springs

aya: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
translation: and will have whatever fruit they desire.

aya: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
translation: [They will be told,] “Eat and drink joyfully, as a reward for what you used to do.”

aya: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: This is how We reward those who do good.

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
translation: “Eat and enjoy yourselves for a while; you are truly wicked.”

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
translation: When it is said to them, “Bow [in prayer]”, they do not bow.

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

aya: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: In which message after this [Qur’an] will they believe?

aya: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
translation: About what are they asking one another?

aya: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
translation: About the momentous news,

aya: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
translation: about which they differ.

aya: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
translation: No indeed; they will come to know.

aya: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
translation: Again no; they will come to know.

aya: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَٰدًا
translation: Have We not made the earth a resting place?

aya: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
translation: And the mountains as stakes,

aya: وَخَلَقْنَٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا
translation: and created you in pairs,

aya: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
translation: and made your sleep for rest,

aya: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
translation: and made the night a covering,

aya: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
translation: and made the day for seeking livelihood,

aya: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
translation: and built above you seven mighty heavens,

aya: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
translation: and made therein a blazing lamp,

aya: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءً ثَجَّاجًا
translation: and sent down from the rainclouds abundant water,

aya: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
translation: so that We may produce thereby grains and vegetation,

aya: وَجَنَّٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا
translation: and gardens with dense foliage?

aya: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتًا
translation: Indeed, the Day of Judgment is a time appointed,

aya: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
translation: the Day when the Trumpet will be blown, you will come forth in crowds,

aya: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًا
translation: and the sky will be opened up and will become gateways,

aya: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
translation: and the mountains will vanish, becoming like a mirage.

aya: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
translation: Indeed, Hell is lying in wait,

aya: لِّلطَّٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًا
translation: a resort for the transgressors,

aya: لَّٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًا
translation: wherein they will abide for endless ages.

aya: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
translation: They will neither taste therein any coolness nor any drink,

aya: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
translation: except scalding water and discharge of wounds,

aya: جَزَآءً وِفَاقًا
translation: a fitting recompense.

aya: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
translation: Indeed, they did not expect a reckoning,

aya: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابًا
translation: and utterly rejected Our verses.

aya: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَٰهُ كِتَٰبًا
translation: But We have enumerated everything in a record.

aya: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
translation: So taste [the punishment], for We will not increase you except in torment.”

aya: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
translation: Indeed, the righteous will have salvation,

aya: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَٰبًا
translation: gardens and vineyards,

aya: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
translation: and full-bosomed maidens of equal age,

aya: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
translation: and a full cup [of wine].

aya: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا
translation: They will not hear therein vain talk or lies –

aya: جَزَآءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًا
translation: a reward and a generous gift from your Lord,

aya: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
translation: [from] the Lord of the heavens and earth and all that is between them, the Most Compassionate; none will dare to speak to Him.

aya: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
translation: On the Day when the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows; none will dare to speak, except those to whom the Most Compassionate granted permission, and they will only speak the truth.

aya: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
translation: That Day is sure to come. So whoever wills may seek a path leading to his Lord.

aya: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
translation: Indeed, We have warned you of an imminent punishment on the Day when everyone will see what his hands have sent forth, and the disbeliever will say, “Oh, I wish that I were dust!”

aya: وَٱلنَّٰزِعَٰتِ غَرْقًا
translation: By those who pull out [evil souls] harshly,

aya: وَٱلنَّٰشِطَٰتِ نَشْطًا
translation: and by those who draw out [good souls] gently,

aya: وَٱلسَّٰبِحَٰتِ سَبْحًا
translation: and by those who glide swiftly,

aya: فَٱلسَّٰبِقَٰتِ سَبْقًا
translation: and those who overtake one another as in a race,

aya: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًا
translation: and those who carry out the command [of Allah],

aya: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
translation: on the Day when the earth convulses [by the first Blast],

aya: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
translation: followed by the second Blast,

aya: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
translation: hearts will be pounding on that Day,

aya: أَبْصَٰرُهَا خَٰشِعَةٌ
translation: and their eyes will be downcast.

aya: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ
translation: They say, “Will we be brought back to life,

aya: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمًا نَّخِرَةً
translation: after we have turned into decayed bones?”

aya: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
translation: They say, “Then that would surely be a losing return!”

aya: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
translation: It will only be a single Blast,

aya: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
translation: then they will immediately be above the ground.

aya: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
translation: Has there come to you the story of Moses,

aya: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
translation: when his Lord called out to him at the sacred valley of Tuwa?

aya: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
translation: [Saying,] “Go to Pharaoh, for he has transgressed all bounds”.

aya: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
translation: And say: ‘Are you willing to be purified,

aya: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
translation: and I will guide you to your Lord so that you may fear Him?’”

aya: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْءَايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
translation: Then Moses showed him the greatest sign.

aya: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
translation: But Pharaoh denied it and disobeyed.

aya: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
translation: Then he turned back striving to plot.

aya: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
translation: He gathered [his people] and proclaimed,

aya: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
translation: saying, “I am your lord, the most high.”

aya: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ
translation: So Allah seized him for an exemplary punishment in this life and in the Hereafter.

aya: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ
translation: Indeed, there is a lesson in this for those who fear Allah.

aya: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بَنَىٰهَا
translation: Are you more difficult to create or the heaven that He built?

aya: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
translation: He raised it high and proportioned it,

aya: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
translation: and darkened its night and brought forth its daylight.

aya: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
translation: And thereafter He spread out the earth,

aya: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا
translation: brought forth from it its water and its pasture,

aya: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا
translation: and set the mountains firmly,

aya: مَتَٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
translation: as a provision for you and your grazing livestock.

aya: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
translation: But when the Supreme Calamity comes,

aya: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
translation: on that Day man will remember all what he did,

aya: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
translation: and the Blazing Fire will be exposed for all to see.

aya: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
translation: As for those who transgressed,

aya: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
translation: and preferred the life of this world,

aya: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
translation: the Blazing Fire will be their abode.

aya: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ
translation: But those who feared standing before their Lord and restrained themselves from evil desires,

aya: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
translation: Paradise will surely be their abode.

aya: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا
translation: They ask you concerning the Hour, “When will it be?”

aya: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ
translation: How could you possibly mention that?

aya: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
translation: Its knowledge rests only with your Lord.

aya: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا
translation: You are only a warner for those who fear it.

aya: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا
translation: On the Day when they see it, it will be as if they had remained [in this world] no more than an evening or a morning.

aya: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
translation: He frowned and turned away,

aya: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ
translation: when the blind man came to him.

aya: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
translation: How would you know? Perhaps he might be purified,

aya: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ
translation: or he might take heed and benefit from the reminder?

aya: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
translation: But he who was indifferent,

aya: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
translation: you give him your full attention,

aya: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
translation: although you are not to be blamed if he does not purify himself.

aya: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
translation: But as for the one who came to you striving [for purification],

aya: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
translation: and he fears Allah,

aya: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
translation: you let yourself to be distracted from him.

aya: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
translation: No indeed; this is a reminder –

aya: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
translation: so whoever wills may give heed to it –

aya: فِى صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
translation: on venerable pages,

aya: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ
translation: exalted and purified,

aya: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍ
translation: [preserved] in the hands of angel-scribes,

aya: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍ
translation: honorable and obedient.

aya: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ
translation: Woe to man; how ungrateful he is!

aya: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
translation: From what did He create him?

aya: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
translation: He created him from a drop of semen and proportioned him,

aya: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
translation: then He made the way easy for him;

aya: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ
translation: then He caused him to die and be buried;

aya: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
translation: then when He wills, He will resurrect him.

aya: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
translation: Yet he has not fulfilled what He commanded him.

aya: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
translation: Let man consider the food he eats:

aya: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّا
translation: How We poured down rainwater in torrents,

aya: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
translation: and caused the soil to split open [for sprouts],

aya: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
translation: and cause grains to grow in it,

aya: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
translation: as well as grapes and fodder,

aya: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
translation: and olive trees and date palms,

aya: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًا
translation: and dense orchards,

aya: وَفَٰكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
translation: and fruits and grass,

aya: مَّتَٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
translation: as provision for you and your livestock.

aya: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
translation: But when the Deafening Blast comes,

aya: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
translation: on that Day everyone will flee from his sibling,

aya: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
translation: and from his mother and father,

aya: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
translation: and from his wife and children.

aya: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
translation: On that day, everyone will have enough concern of his own.

aya: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
translation: On that Day, some faces will be bright,

aya: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
translation: cheerful and rejoicing;

aya: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
translation: while other faces will be dust-stained,

aya: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
translation: covered in darkness.

aya: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ
translation: Such are the disbelievers, the wicked.

aya: إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
translation: When the sun is wrapped up in darkness,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ
translation: and when the stars are scattered,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
translation: and when the mountains are vanished,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
translation: and when pregnant camels are left unattended,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
translation: and when wild beasts are gathered,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
translation: and when the seas are set on fire,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
translation: and when the souls are sorted,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ
translation: and when the baby girl buried alive is asked,

aya: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍ قُتِلَتْ
translation: for what crime she was killed,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
translation: and when records of deeds are spread open,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ
translation: and when the sky is stripped away,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
translation: and when the Blazing Fire is flared up,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
translation: and when Paradise is brought near –

aya: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ
translation: then every soul will know what it has brought about.

aya: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ
translation: I swear by the receding stars,

aya: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ
translation: that rise and hide,

aya: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
translation: and by the night as it departs,

aya: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
translation: and by the day as it breaks –

aya: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
translation: Indeed, this [Qur’an] is a word conveyed by a noble angel-messenger.

aya: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
translation: extremely powerful, highly revered with the Lord of the Throne,

aya: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
translation: obeyed [by other angels] and moreover, trustworthy.

aya: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
translation: Your fellow [the Prophet] is not madman.

aya: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
translation: He indeed saw him [Gabriel] on the clear horizon.

aya: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
translation: He does not withhold [knowledge of] the unseen.

aya: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَٰنٍ رَّجِيمٍ
translation: This [Qur’an] is not the word of an accursed devil.

aya: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
translation: So which way are you going?

aya: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: It is but a reminder to the worlds,

aya: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
translation: for those among you who wish to take the straight path.

aya: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: But you cannot wish except by the Will of Allah, the Lord of the worlds.

aya: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ
translation: When the sky breaks apart.

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ
translation: and when the stars fall, scattered,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
translation: and when the seas burst forth,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
translation: and when the graves are overturned,

aya: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
translation: then each soul will come to know what it has done or what it has left undone.

aya: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
translation: O mankind, what has lured you away from your Lord, the Most Generous,

aya: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
translation: Who created you, then shaped and proportioned you,

aya: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
translation: and assembled you in whatever form He willed?

aya: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
translation: No indeed; but you deny the Judgment Day,

aya: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَٰفِظِينَ
translation: while there are watchers over you,

aya: كِرَامًا كَٰتِبِينَ
translation: honorable scribes,

aya: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
translation: who know whatever you do.

aya: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in Bliss,

aya: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍ
translation: and the wicked will be in the Blazing Fire,

aya: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: which they will enter on Judgment Day,

aya: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
translation: and will never come out of it.

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: How do you know what Judgment Day is?

aya: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: Again, how do you know what Judgment Day is?

aya: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
translation: It is the Day when no soul will be of any help to another, and all command on that Day will be with Allah.

aya: وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
translation: Woe to the defrauders,

aya: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
translation: those who take full measure when they take from others,

aya: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
translation: but they give less when they measure or weigh for them.

aya: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
translation: Do they really not think that they will be resurrected

aya: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
translation: for a momentous Day,

aya: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: a Day when people will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

aya: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ
translation: No indeed! The record of the wicked is surely in Sijjīn.

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
translation: How do you know what Sijjīn is?

aya: كِتَٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
translation: It is a clearly inscribed Record.

aya: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers,

aya: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: those who deny the Judgment Day!

aya: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
translation: None denies it except every sinful transgressor.

aya: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, “Ancient fables!”

aya: كَلَّا بَلْ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
translation: No indeed! Their hearts have been stained by what they used to commit!

aya: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
translation: No indeed! On that Day they will be barred from seeing their Lord.

aya: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
translation: They will then surely enter the Blazing Fire,

aya: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
translation: then they will be told, “This is what you used to deny.”

aya: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
translation: No indeed! The record of the righteous is certainly in ‘illiyyīn –

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
translation: and how do you know what ‘illiyyūn is? –

aya: كِتَٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
translation: It is a record inscribed,

aya: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
translation: witnessed by those who are close to Allah.

aya: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in Bliss,

aya: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
translation: seated on the couches, gazing in wonder.

aya: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
