translation: You will see on their faces the radiance of bliss.

aya: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
translation: They will be served to drink pure wine from a sealed container,

aya: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
translation: whose last sip is musk – let those who strive, strive for that –

aya: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
translation: and it will be mixed with water from the spring of Tasnīm,

aya: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
translation: a spring from which those who are close to Allah will drink.

aya: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
translation: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers;

aya: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
translation: when they passed by them, they would wink at one another,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
translation: and when they went back to their people, they would return exulting.

aya: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
translation: When they saw the believers, they would say, “These people are truly misguided,”

aya: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَٰفِظِينَ
translation: although they were not sent as their keepers.

aya: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
translation: So Today the believers will laugh at the disbelievers,

aya: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
translation: while sitting on the couches, gazing around.

aya: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
translation: Have the disbelievers been rewarded except for what they used to do?

aya: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ
translation: When the sky is rent asunder,

aya: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
translation: and hearkens to its Lord, as it must,

aya: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
translation: and when the earth is leveled out,

aya: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
translation: and casts out all what it contains, and becomes empty,

aya: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
translation: and hearkens to its Lord, as it must,

aya: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
translation: O humans, you are toiling towards your Lord, and you will surely meet Him.

aya: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
translation: Whoever is given his Record in his right hand,

aya: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
translation: he will have an easy reckoning,

aya: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
translation: and he will return to his people joyfully.

aya: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
translation: But whoever is given his Record from behind his back,

aya: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا
translation: he will call out for destruction,

aya: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
translation: and he will enter the Blazing Fire.

aya: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
translation: Indeed, he used to live among his people joyfully.

aya: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
translation: and he thought that he would never return [to Allah].

aya: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا
translation: Indeed he will! His Lord was always watching him.

aya: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
translation: Indeed, I swear by the twilight,

aya: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
translation: and by the night and what it covers,

aya: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
translation: and by the moon when it becomes full,

aya: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
translation: You will surely pass from one stage to another.

aya: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: Then what is the matter with them that they do not believe,

aya: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ
translation: and when the Qur’an is recited to them, they do not prostrate?

aya: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ
translation: Rather, the disbelievers persist in denying it,

aya: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
translation: but Allah knows best whatever they harbor in their hearts.

aya: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
translation: So give them the tidings of a painful punishment.

aya: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
translation: But those who believe and do righteous deeds will have a never-ending reward.

aya: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ
translation: By the sky full of constellations,

aya: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ
translation: and by the promised Day,

aya: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
translation: and by the witness and the witnessed,

aya: قُتِلَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ
translation: cursed be the makers of the trench,

aya: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ
translation: the fire full of fuel,

aya: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
translation: when they sat around it,

aya: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
translation: and were witnessing what they did to the believers.

aya: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
translation: Their only grievance against them was that they believed in Allah, the All-Mighty, the Praiseworthy,

aya: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
translation: to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and earth, and Allah is Witness over all things.

aya: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
translation: Indeed, for those who tortured the believing men and women, then did not repent, there will be the punishment of Hell and the punishment of the burning fire.

aya: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
translation: But those who believed and did righteous deeds will certainly have gardens under which rivers flow; that is the supreme triumph.

aya: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
translation: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is severe.

aya: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
translation: Indeed, it is He Who originates [the creation] then repeats it,

aya: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ
translation: and He is the All-Forgiving, the Most Affectionate,

aya: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ
translation: the Lord of the Glorious Throne;

aya: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
translation: He does whatever He wills.

aya: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ
translation: Has there not come to you the story of the forces

aya: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
translation: of Pharaoh and Thamūd?

aya: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍ
translation: But the disbelievers are in persistent denial,

aya: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ
translation: although Allah encompasses them from all sides.

aya: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌ مَّجِيدٌ
translation: But this is a glorious Qur’an,

aya: فِى لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ
translation: [inscribed] in a Preserved Tablet.

aya: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
translation: By the sky and the night comer –

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
translation: and how do you know what the night comer is?

aya: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
translation: It is the star of piercing brightness –

aya: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
translation: there is no soul except that there is a watcher over it.

aya: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
translation: Let man reflect on what he was created from.

aya: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍ دَافِقٍ
translation: He was created from a spurting fluid,

aya: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
translation: emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

aya: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌ
translation: Indeed, Allah is able to bring him back to life.

aya: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
translation: On the Day when all secrets will be disclosed,

aya: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
translation: he will then have no power, nor any helper.

aya: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ
translation: By the sky and its recurring rain,

aya: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ
translation: and by the earth that cracks open [with the sprout of plants],

aya: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
translation: Indeed, this [Qur’an] is a decisive word,

aya: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ
translation: which is not for amusement.

aya: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
translation: Indeed, they are devising a plan.

aya: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
translation: I am too devising a plan.

aya: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا
translation: So bear with the disbelievers, and respite them for a while.

aya: سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى
translation: Glorify the name of your Lord, the Most High,

aya: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
translation: Who created and fashioned in due proportion,

aya: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
translation: and Who determined [the creation] then guided them,

aya: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ
translation: and Who brings forth the pasture,

aya: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ
translation: then makes it into withered chaff.

aya: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
translation: We will teach you [the Qur’an], so you will not forget,

aya: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
translation: except what Allah wills, for indeed He knows what is manifest and what is hidden.

aya: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
translation: We will guide you to the easy way.

aya: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
translation: So remind, if the reminder should benefit.

aya: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
translation: He who fears Allah will take heed,

aya: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى
translation: but the wretched will avoid it,

aya: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
translation: who will enter the Great Fire,

aya: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
translation: wherein he will neither die nor live.

aya: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
translation: Indeed, he who purifies himself will attain success,

aya: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
translation: and remembers his Lord’s Name and prays.

aya: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
translation: But you prefer the life of this world,

aya: وَٱلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
translation: even though the Hereafter is better and more lasting.

aya: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
translation: Indeed, this was in the earlier Scriptures,

aya: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
translation: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

aya: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَٰشِيَةِ
translation: Has there come to you the story of the Overwhelming Event?

aya: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
translation: On that Day, some faces will be humiliated,

aya: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
translation: toiling and weary,

aya: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
translation: as they burn in a scorching Fire.

aya: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍ
translation: They will be made to drink from a boiling spring,

aya: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
translation: and they will have no food except bitter thorny plants,

aya: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍ
translation: that neither nourishes nor satisfies hunger.

aya: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
translation: Other faces on that Day will be joyful,

aya: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
translation: well-pleased with their past striving,

aya: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
translation: in an elevated garden,

aya: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةً
translation: wherein no idle talk will be heard.

aya: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
translation: There will be a flowing spring;

aya: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
translation: and couches raised high,

aya: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
translation: and cups placed ready,

aya: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
translation: and cushions lined up,

aya: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
translation: and splendid carpets spread out.

aya: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
translation: Do they not reflect on the camel, how it is created;

aya: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
translation: and the sky, how it is raised high;

aya: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
translation: and the mountains, how they are firmly set up;

aya: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
translation: and the earth, how it is spread out?

aya: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
translation: So remind [O Prophet]; your duty is only to remind;

aya: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
translation: you are not assigned to compel them.

aya: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
translation: But whoever turns away and disbelieves,

aya: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ
translation: Allah will inflict upon him the greatest punishment.

aya: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ
translation: Indeed, to Us is their return,

aya: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
translation: then it is for Us to call them to account.

aya: وَٱلْفَجْرِ
translation: By the dawn,

aya: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
translation: and the ten nights,

aya: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ
translation: and the even and the odd,

aya: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
translation: and by the night when it comes,

aya: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
translation: are these oaths not sufficient for those who have sense?

aya: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with ‘Ād

aya: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ
translation: of Iram, who were people of great stature,

aya: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
translation: the like of whom had never been created in the land;

aya: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ
translation: and Thamūd, who carved out the rocks in the Valley;

aya: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
translation: and the mighty and powerful Pharaoh?

aya: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
translation: All of them transgressed in the land,

aya: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ
translation: and spread therein much corruption,

aya: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
translation: so your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

aya: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ
translation: Indeed, your Lord is ever vigilant.

aya: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
translation: As for man, when he is tested by his Lord by honoring him and bestowing blessings upon him, he says, “My Lord has [deservedly] honored me!”

aya: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
translation: But when he is tested by restricting his provision, he says, “My Lord has [undeservedly] humiliated me!”

aya: كَلَّا بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
translation: No indeed! You are not kind to the orphan,

aya: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
translation: nor do you urge one another to feed the needy,

aya: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
translation: and you greedily consume the entire inheritance,

aya: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
translation: and love wealth immensely.

aya: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
translation: No indeed! When the earth is crushed over and over,

aya: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
translation: and your Lord comes with the angels, rank after rank,

aya: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
translation: and Hell is brought near on that Day – this is when man will understand, but what is the use of that understanding?

aya: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى
translation: He will say, “Would that I had sent forth something for my [eternal] life!”

aya: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
translation: None can punish as He punishes on that Day,

aya: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
translation: and none can bind as He binds.

aya: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
translation: [It will be said to the believer,] “O the tranquil soul!

aya: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
translation: Return to your Lord, well pleased and pleasing [to Him].

aya: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَٰدِى
translation: Join My [righteous] slaves,

aya: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى
translation: and enter My Paradise.”

aya: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
translation: I do swear by this city [of Makkah] –

aya: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
translation: and you are free of restriction [for a while] in this city –

aya: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
translation: and by every parent and offspring,

aya: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ
translation: We have created man in hardship.

aya: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
translation: Does he think that none can ever have power over him?

aya: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
translation: He says, “I have squandered enormous wealth!”

aya: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
translation: Does he think that no one sees him?

aya: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ
translation: Have We not given him two eyes,

aya: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
translation: and a tongue and two lips,

aya: وَهَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ
translation: and shown him the two ways [of right and wrong]?

aya: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ
translation: Yet he did not make his way through the steep path,

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ
translation: and how do you know what the steep path is?

aya: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
translation: It is freeing a slave,

aya: أَوْ إِطْعَٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
translation: or giving food on a day of hunger,

aya: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
translation: to an orphan relative,

aya: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
translation: or to a needy person in misery,

aya: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
translation: then [most importantly] to be one of those who believe and exhort one another to patience and exhort one another to compassion.

aya: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ
translation: Such are the people of the Right.

aya: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
translation: As for those who reject Our signs, they are the people of the Left,

aya: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ
translation: who will be locked up in the Fire.

aya: وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
translation: By the sun and its brightness,

aya: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
translation: and by the moon as it follows it,

aya: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
translation: and by the day as it displays it,

aya: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا
translation: and by the night as it covers it,

aya: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
translation: and by the sky and how He made it,

aya: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
translation: and by the earth and how He spread it,

aya: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
translation: and by the soul and how He fashioned it,

aya: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا
translation: then inspired it [to know] its wickedness and righteousness,

aya: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
translation: Indeed, he who purifies his soul will attain success,

aya: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
translation: and he who corrupts it will be doomed.

aya: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ
translation: Thamūd rejected [the messenger] because of their transgression,

aya: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا
translation: when the most wretched among them rose [to kill the camel].

aya: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَٰهَا
translation: Although the messenger of Allah warned them, “Hands off the she-camel of Allah and her drink!”

aya: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
translation: Yet they rejected him and hamstrung her. So their Lord destroyed them for their sin and leveled them to the ground.

aya: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَٰهَا
translation: And He has no fear of the consequences thereof.

aya: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
translation: By the night when it covers,

aya: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
translation: and by the day when it appears,

aya: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
translation: and by His creation of male and female,

aya: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
translation: surely your efforts are divergent.

aya: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
translation: As for the one who gives in charity and fears Allah,

aya: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
translation: and truly believes in the best reward,

aya: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
translation: We will make easy for him the way of salvation.

aya: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
translation: But as for the one who is miserly and deems himself self-sufficient,

aya: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
translation: and denies the best reward,

aya: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
translation: We will make easy for him the way of perdition.

aya: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
translation: His wealth will be of no avail to him when he tumbles [into Hell].

aya: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
translation: Indeed, it is upon Us to show the right way,

aya: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْءَاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ
translation: and surely to Us belong the Hereafter and the present life.

aya: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
translation: So I warn you of a raging Fire,

aya: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى
translation: none will enter it except the most wretched,

aya: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
translation: who denied and turned away.

aya: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى
translation: But the most righteous will be saved from it,

aya: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
translation: who spends his wealth to purify himself,

aya: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ
translation: not in return for someone’s favors,

aya: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
translation: but to seek the pleasure of his Lord, the Most High.

aya: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
translation: He will surely be well pleased.

aya: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
translation: By the morning brightness,

aya: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
translation: and by the night when it is still,

aya: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
translation: your Lord has not forsaken you [O Prophet], nor does He hate you;

aya: وَلَلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
translation: the Hereafter is better for you than the present life;

aya: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ
translation: and your Lord will certainly give you so much that you will be well pleased.

aya: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
translation: Did He not find you an orphan then take good care of you?

aya: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّا فَهَدَىٰ
translation: Did He not find you unguided then guide you?

aya: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
translation: Did He not find you in need then enrich you?

aya: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
translation: So do not mistreat the orphan,

aya: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
translation: nor repulse the beggar;

aya: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
translation: and proclaim the blessings of your Lord.

aya: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
translation: Have We not reassured your heart for you [O Prophet],

aya: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
translation: and relieved you of your burden

aya: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
translation: that weighed down your back,

aya: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
translation: and raised high your fame for you?

aya: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
translation: For indeed, with hardship comes ease,

aya: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
translation: indeed, with hardship comes ease.

aya: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ
translation: So whenever you are free, strive in worship,

aya: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب
translation: and turn to your Lord in devotion.

aya: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ
translation: By the fig and the olive [of Jerusalem],

aya: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
translation: and by Mount Sinai [of Egypt],

aya: وَهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ
translation: and by this secure city [of Makkah],

aya: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
translation: Surely We have created man in the best form,

aya: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ
translation: then We will reduce him to the lowest of the low,

aya: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
translation: except those who believe and do righteous deeds; they will have a never-ending reward.

aya: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
translation: Then, what makes you deny the Judgment Day?

aya: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَٰكِمِينَ
translation: Is not Allah the Most Just of all judges?

aya: ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ
translation: Read in the name of your Lord Who created,

aya: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
translation: created man from a clinging clot.

aya: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ
translation: Read, and your Lord is the Most Generous,

aya: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ
translation: Who taught by the pen,

aya: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
translation: taught man what he did not know.

aya: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ
translation: Indeed, man transgresses

aya: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ
translation: when he deems himself to be self-sufficient.

aya: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ
translation: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.

aya: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ
translation: Have you seen the one who prevents

aya: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
translation: a slave [of Allah] from praying?

aya: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
translation: What if this [slave] is rightly guided,

aya: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ
translation: and enjoins righteousness?

aya: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
translation: How about the one who denies and turns away?

aya: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
translation: Does he not know that Allah is watching all?

aya: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
translation: No indeed; if he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock –

aya: نَاصِيَةٍ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
translation: a lying, sinful forelock.

aya: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
translation: So let him call his associates;

aya: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ
translation: We will call the wardens of Hellfire.

aya: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب
translation: No indeed; do not obey him, but prostrate and draw near [to Allah].

aya: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
translation: Indeed, We sent this [Qur’an] down in the Night of Decree.

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ
translation: How do you know what the Night of Decree is?

aya: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

aya: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
translation: On that night the angels and the Spirit [Gabriel] descend by their Lord’s permission with all decrees.

aya: سَلَٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ
translation: It is all peace until the break of dawn.

aya: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
translation: Those who disbelieve from the People of the Book and the polytheists were not going to desist [from disbelief] until there came to them clear proof,

aya: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
translation: a messenger from Allah, reciting pure pages

aya: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
translation: containing upright commandments.

aya: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
translation: Yet those who were given the Scripture did not disagree except after the clear proof came to them,

aya: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ
translation: although they were commanded only to worship Allah with sincere devotion to Him, being inclined to true faith, and to establish prayer and give zakah; that is the true religion.

aya: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
translation: Those who disbelieve from the People of the Book and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding therein forever. It is they who are the worst of creatures.

aya: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
translation: As for those who believe and do righteous deeds – it is they who are the best of creatures.

aya: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
translation: Their reward with their Lord is Gardens of Eternity under which rivers flow, abiding therein forever. Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. This is for those who fear their Lord.

aya: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
translation: When the earth is shaken with a mighty quake,

aya: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
translation: and the earth throws out its burdens,

aya: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
translation: and man says, “What is the matter with it?”

aya: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
translation: On that Day it will recount all its news,

aya: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
translation: because your Lord has inspired it [to do so].

aya: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ
translation: On that Day all people will come forward in separate groups to be shown their deeds.

aya: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
translation: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it,

aya: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
translation: and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.

aya: وَٱلْعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبْحًا
translation: By the galloping, panting horses,

aya: فَٱلْمُورِيَٰتِ قَدْحًا
translation: striking sparks of fire [with their hooves],

aya: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًا
translation: launching raids at dawn,

aya: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًا
translation: stirring up thereby clouds of dust,

aya: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا
translation: plunging thereby into the midst of the enemy,

aya: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌ
translation: indeed, man is very ungrateful to his Lord –

aya: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
translation: and he himself is a witness to that –

aya: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
translation: and he is truly extreme in his love of wealth.

aya: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
translation: Does he not know that the contents of graves will be overturned,

aya: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
translation: and the secrets of the hearts will be brought to light?

aya: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ
translation: Indeed, their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day.

aya: ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
translation: The Striking Calamity!

aya: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
translation: What is the Striking Calamity?

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
translation: How do you know what the Striking Calamity is?

aya: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ
translation: On that Day people will be like scattered moths,

aya: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ
translation: and the mountains will be like carded wool.

aya: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
translation: Then the one whose scales of good deeds are heavy,

aya: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
translation: will have a pleasant life.

aya: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
translation: But the one whose scales of good deeds are light,

aya: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌ
translation: his abode will be the abyss.

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ
translation: And how do you know what it is?

aya: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ
translation: It is a Blazing Fire.

aya: أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
translation: Competition for worldly gains distracts you [from Allah],

aya: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ
translation: until you come to your graves.

aya: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
translation: No indeed! You will come to know.

aya: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
translation: Again no! You will come to know.

aya: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
translation: No indeed! If only you knew for certain.

aya: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ
translation: You will surely see the Blazing Fire,

aya: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
translation: Again, you will see it with absolute certainty.

aya: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
translation: Then on that Day you will surely be asked about your worldly pleasures.

aya: وَٱلْعَصْرِ
translation: By the time,

aya: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ
translation: man is in utter loss,

aya: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
translation: except those who believe and do righteous deeds, and exhort one another to the truth and exhort one another to patience.

aya: وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
translation: Woe to every backbiter and slanderer,

aya: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
translation: who amasses wealth and counts it over and again,

aya: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ
translation: thinking that his wealth will make him live forever.

aya: كَلَّا لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ
translation: No indeed! He will surely be cast into the Crushing Fire,

aya: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ
translation: and how do you know what the Crushing Fire is?

aya: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ
translation: It is the kindled Fire of Allah,

aya: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ
translation: which reaches the hearts.

aya: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
translation: It will be closed down upon them,

aya: فِى عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ
translation: locked with towering columns.

aya: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
translation: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the people of the Elephant?

aya: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍ
translation: Did He not turn their scheme into a total loss?

aya: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
translation: He sent against them swarms of birds,

aya: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
translation: pelting them with stones of baked clay,

aya: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍۭ
translation: leaving them like chewed up and trampled chaff.

aya: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ
translation: For the accustomed security of Quraysh,

aya: إِۦلَٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ
translation: secure in their winter and summer journeys.

aya: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ
translation: Let them worship the Lord of this [Sacred] House,

aya: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
translation: Who fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear.

aya: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
translation: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

aya: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
translation: Such is the one who repulses the orphan harshly,

aya: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
translation: and does not urge others to feed the needy.

aya: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
translation: So woe to those who pray,

aya: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
translation: but are heedless of their prayer;

aya: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ
translation: those who only show off,

aya: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ
translation: and withhold even the small kindnesses.

aya: إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ
translation: We have surely given you [O Prophet] Al-Kauthar [abundance],

aya: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ
translation: so pray and sacrifice to your Lord alone.

aya: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ
translation: Indeed, the one who hates you is truly cut off [from all goodness].

aya: قُلْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ
translation: Say, “O disbelievers,

aya: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
translation: I do not worship what you worship,

aya: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
translation: nor do you worship what I worship.

aya: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
translation: Never will I worship what you worship,

aya: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
translation: nor will you ever worship what I worship.

aya: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ
translation: You have your religion and I have my religion.

aya: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ
translation: When there comes Allah’s help and the conquest,

aya: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
translation: and you see people entering Allah’s religion in multitudes,

aya: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
translation: then glorify the praise of your Lord, and ask His forgiveness. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.

aya: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish, and may he perish!

aya: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
translation: Neither his wealth nor his worldly gains will avail him.

aya: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
translation: He will burn in a Flaming Fire,

aya: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ
translation: and so will his wife, the carrier of firewood,

aya: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ
translation: around her neck will be a rope of palm fiber.

aya: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
translation: Say: He is Allah, the One;

aya: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
translation: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

aya: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
translation: He neither begets nor is He begotten,

aya: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
translation: and there is none comparable to Him.”

aya: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ
translation: Say, “I seek refuge with the Lord of the daybreak,

aya: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
translation: from the harm of all what He has created;

aya: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
translation: from the harm of night’s darkness when it spreads around,

aya: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ
translation: from the harm of the sorceresses who blow on knots,

aya: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
translation: and from the harm of the envier when he envies.

aya: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: Say, “I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind,

aya: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: the Sovereign of mankind,

aya: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: the God of mankind,

aya: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ
translation: from the harm of the lurking whisperer,

aya: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: who whispers into the hearts of mankind,

aya: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
translation: from among jinn and mankind.”
